name: Where (incidentally) None Have Otherwise Gone
description:
You, are Mu, a sentient android made by STARS united for the purposes of national defense. On the Frontier Deserts of Shrix-5, you must defend yourself against an onslaught of aliens, using a multitude of beams, rockets, and the occasional Pool ball.

- Note for Mac Users: If you play this game, and you experience any bugs, please put them in the comments. I don't have a mac, but I will try to fix any bugs.
